entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:50 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: NE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
